sentences.sContent: Listen, when you start to feel weak, just tell yourself, ‘I’m as strong as a girder’ .
sentences.sContent_eng: Listen, when you start to feel weak, just tell yourself, ‘I’m as strong as a girder’ .
sentences.sCn: 听着，当你开始觉得虚弱的时候，就对自己说：‘我像 钢梁 一样强壮’。

sentences.sContent: A worker walks on a steel girder at a building under construction in Nanjing, Jiangsu province, on May 5, 2011. (Reuters/Sean Yong)
sentences.sContent_eng: A worker walks on a steel girder at a building under construction in Nanjing, Jiangsu province, on May 5, 2011. (Reuters/Sean Yong)
sentences.sCn: 一名工人在建筑工地的钢梁上散步，摄于2011年5月5日江苏省南京市。

phrases.pCn: 相当桁；主船体桁，船桁体

trans.tranOther: a strong beam, made of iron or steel, that supports a floor, roof, or bridge
